name: RbxCity Dark Theme
description: A slick dark theme for RbxCity with green, white and grey accents to tone down the website and make viewing easier on the eyes - particularly at night.
additional_info:
This will likely be temporary until the entire website is either switched to dark theme or a theme switcher is made available in a future update. Report any bugs or inconsistencies to Atlas#8889 on Discord.

Made by Atlas_Rise.

5/27/2019: Initial release.

5/28/2019: Second release with major fixes to the UI including removing messy borders, restructuring code, breaking down CSS into the individual pages that they apply to in order to ensure the highest quality possible. Modals for forums re-done. Theme expanded to all RbxCity pages except for staff endpoints, coming in next release.

5/29/2019: Condensed code from 536 lines to just 187 lines by finding common elements across all pages on the website and styling them all at once, rather than having highly specific and defined rules per page for more uniform application of style rules. This theme is now highly suited for editing and distribution of other custom themes.

5/29/2019: Bug fix.

5/30/2019: Server Connection Status popup is now stylized with hex color code #23d160 and a border radius of 4px to match the rest of the website, no shadows. Fixed jumbotrons on user pages under Statistics - they are now grey instead of green. Fixed issue with white backgrounds on navbar items on hover and inconsistencies with green colored elements. Applied styling to tracked threads page.
